alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 18 at 4:38AM EDT until April 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Dry conditions and gusty winds will create an enhanced risk for wildfire ignition and spread Today... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, GUSTY WINDS, AND DRY FUELS FOR SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA, AND PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN, CENTRAL, AND EASTERN WEST VIRGINIA... The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative humidity, gusty winds and dry fuels, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM EDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 003 Dickenson, Fire Weather Zone 004 Buchanan, Fire Weather Zone 013 Lincoln, Fire Weather Zone 015 Kanawha, Fire Weather Zone 016 Roane, Fire Weather Zone 018 Calhoun, Fire Weather Zone 024 Mingo, Fire Weather Zone 025 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 026 Boone, Fire Weather Zone 027 Clay, Fire Weather Zone 028 Braxton, Fire Weather Zone 029 Gilmer, Fire Weather Zone 030 Lewis, Fire Weather Zone 031 Harrison, Fire Weather Zone 032 Taylor, Fire Weather Zone 033 McDowell, Fire Weather Zone 034 Wyoming, Fire Weather Zone 039 Upshur, Fire Weather Zone 040 Barbour, Fire Weather Zone 515 Northwest Raleigh, Fire Weather Zone 516 Southeast Raleigh, Fire Weather Zone 517 Northwest Fayette, Fire Weather Zone 518 Southeast Fayette, Fire Weather Zone 519 Northwest Nicholas, Fire Weather Zone 520 Southeast Nicholas, Fire Weather Zone 521 Northwest Webster, Fire Weather Zone 522 Southeast Webster, Fire Weather Zone 523 Northwest Pocahontas, Fire Weather Zone 524 Southeast Pocahontas, Fire Weather Zone 525 Northwest Randolph and Fire Weather Zone 526 Southeast Randolph. * Timing...Thus afternoon through this evening. * Winds...West 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph across much of the area, and 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to 50 mph in the northeast West Virginia mountains. * Relative Humidity...As low as 24 percent. * Temperatures...In the 60s across much of the area, and upper 40s to upper 50s in the northeast West Virginia mountains. * Lightning...None. * Impacts...Enhanced risk of wildfire ignition and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...dry fuels and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
